description.value:
Trigger Abendego's Squall matches speed with the Snapdragon

Effect The orca leaps across the Snapdragon and tears its main mast from the deck in the process. This deals @Damage[30] damage to the Snapdragon. All creatures on deck take @Damage[1d8[bludgeoning]] damage from the shrapnel and must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:20|showdc:gm|basic] save. Abendego's Squall rolls initiative.

details.description: A massive orca known as Abendego's Squall leaps from the water. Its mouth opens to snap against any part of the ship that it can reach.
details.disable: @Check[medicine|dc:20] (trained) to remove the harpoon, @Check[nature|dc:17] (trained) to calm the orca, or @Check[intimidation|dc:20] (trained) to scare the orca away; two total successes are required to subdue the orca

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-00: Salt of the Ocean

details.reset: The orca returns to hunt down the Snapdragon after 8 hours.
details.routine:
d Abendego's Squall Leaps over the Snapdragon with each action. When it lands, it deals @Damage[1] damage to the Snapdragon. All creatures on the deck take @Damage[1d8[bludgeoning]] damage and must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:20|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} until the end of its next turn.

Speed 30 feet
